steps.title: Group Sidebar
steps.text: This is Lyra's visual sidebar. Here you'll find guides, marks and scales corresponding to the visualization enumerated into groups.
steps.help: If you are stuck, try clearing the scene.

steps.title: Inspector Sidebar
steps.text: The Inspector Sidebar allows you to modify different attributes of the current visualization such as a mark's fill color or the number of ticks  present in a specific axis
steps.help: If you are stuck, try clearing the scene.

steps.title: Pipeline Sidebar
steps.text: This sidebar will be populated with data tables once you've imported data.
steps.help: If you are stuck, try clearing the scene.

steps.title: Toolbar
steps.text: The Toolbar is a utility that allows you to add variaous elements to the visualization
steps.help: If you are stuck, try clearing the scene.
